Text:
V - 6/10
A - 7/10

Do not watch this using a Widescreen monitor, that's 24" or above, my 42" monitor made it look like it had been going through 3 passes of Film Graining, but on my 21.4" it was awesome.
Suggestively; watch this far away from the monitor(If you've got a wide one), or on a normal 4:3 monitor.

In summary; great movie, great audio, great vid, definitely worth downloading.
